product_name: REI Vivo Vacuum-Sleeve Mug - 15 fl. oz.
long_description: The stainless-steel REI Vivo Vacuum-Sleeve Mug will keep your drinks warm or cool when you're on the go. Double-walled stainless-steel design uses efficient vacuum insulation. Push-button lid helps prevent spills and makes drinking easy. The REI Vivo Vacuum-Sleeve Mug keeps beverages warm for up to 3 hours or cool for up to 4 hours.
short_description: The stainless-steel REI Vivo Vacuum-Sleeve Mug will keep your drinks warm or cool when you're on the go.
